Hey <@U7P6G42AX> , Could you or <@U01QA9LNN2V> please help me setting up the app for the HubSpot Media Bridge?
I tried creating the app - but couldn't find the required scopes.

I'm assuming I need some sort of approval from the HubSpot team - to get this up and running. Could you guys please help?
I don't know anything about setting up integrations like that but maybe either Lincoln or <@U6MHBFW1K> would know?
at this point the Media Bridge is in public beta so the scopes should be abailable for all apps to request
Let us know if you encounter an error or other issue requesting those

Thanks <@U7P6G42AX> & <@U6MHBFW1K>

Unfortunately, While trying to add the scope - our app shows - no scope available. Here's a screenshot for your perusal.
<@U021GTUKK4N> - Could you please help us with this?
<@U6MHBFW1K> / <@U021GTUKK4N> - James can you please help in getting this sorted? We're currently in the middle of getting this up - and are waiting for this to be resolved. Requesting you earnestly.
<@UFBNA9K9A> do you know if other MB developers have encountered this issue?

<@U01E6Q1958A> in the meantime you should be able to manually put together an auth URL (perhaps using other scopes) and then add the MB scopes to it. This will unblock you for testing as long as you use that auth URL to install your app rather than trying to use the “install” button in the marketplace UI

Hello <@U6MHBFW1K>,
We have build the Auth URL that installs the app to the assigned account.
Waiting for you or <@U021GTUKK4N> to update us on the next steps and the scope status.
